{"id":447534061,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1611558377,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/447534061/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"40.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        s = s.replaceAll(\"[^a-zA-Z0-9]\", \"\");\n        s = s.toLowerCase();\n        if (s==null|| s.length()==1 || s.length() ==0){\n            return true;\n        }\n        int apoint = 0;\n        int bpoint = s.length()-1;\n        while (apoint<=bpoint){\n             if (s.charAt(apoint)!=s.charAt(bpoint)){\n                return false;\n             }\n            apoint++;\n            bpoint--;     \n        } \n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
